title: Pixel 2XL - Cannot connect to networks and auto reboots
content:
Device: Pixel 2 XL
Issues:
1. Repeatedly disconnects and can't find any networks (WiFi, Bluetooth and Mobile Networks)
2. Suddenly crashes or Auto reboots
3. Takes over 2 minutes to power on during a reboot.

Troubleshooting attempted:
1. Restarted phone.
2. Reset all network settings
3. Factory reset of entire phone.
